The EU's hunt for critical mineralsThe European Union's law to guarantee a supply of minerals crucial for its green and digital transitions and to end its dependence on Chinese supply will enter force early next year after securing final approval this month. EU sets critical mineral goals, but faces struggle to hit themThe European Union has set targets to dig up, recycle and refine lithium, cobalt and other metals it needs for its green transition, but a shortage of new money, crippling energy costs and local opposition could put them beyond reach.
